name: SerenityNow
0:
”Alexa, open serenity now”
”open for ten seconds”
”replay”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: serenity now
des: Serenity Now lets you take a few minutes every day to relax and listen to the sounds of nature.
priv:
